'''''mar''''' means "dwell, abide" in [[Quenya]].
==Etymology==
[[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[MBAR]] "dwelling, habitation"<ref>{{HM|LR}}, "[[The Etymologies]]"</ref>
==Other forms==
*''maruvan'' "I will abide"<ref>{{HM|UT}}, p. 317</ref>
==See also==
*''[[már]]''
